metadata.summary: Windows event log forensics timeline generator that processes .evtx files or collections for threat hunting
metadata.primary_use_case: Generate forensic timelines from Windows event logs for threat hunting and incident response

extracted_apis.description: Generate CSV timeline from Windows event logs

cross_refs.description: Requires artifacts to be collected before Hayabusa can process them
Commonly processes event logs collected via Velociraptor KAPE
